name: Lily & the Snowman
summary: Every winter, a magical snowman puts on a show for a little girl, but over time, life pulls them apart. Will she remember to take the time for what she loved?
info:
• 中文名: 莉莉和雪人
  • 製作: ChezEddy
  • 上映年度: 2015-12-15
  • 片长: 2min 04s
  • 官方网站: http://www.cineplex.com/SNOWMAN
